name: Monster Legends (itch)
description:
MONSTER LEGENDS

A short game intended to emulate the NES aesthetic. A submission for Lost Cartridge Jam IV.

Controls
  • ASDF / Arrow Keys: Move trainer
  • Z: Make monster shoot bullet
  • X: Keep monster still
  • ENTER: Interact with objects, proceed dialog
Credits
  • Sprite Art & Game Concept: ToastyKnight
  • Story & Writing: Sap
  • Chiptune Music: Mikaboshii
  • Programming: Slyonics
